summary: Diff adds a new Motoko backend with authorization/user-profile models plus sermon/contact data structures, and a new React/TanStack Router frontend with navigation, typography/theme styling, sermon list item UI, scripture quote component, and a contact form. Several BuildRequest requirements are only partially evidenced in the diff summary; a few implemented features appear unrequested and/or conflict with constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide initial seed data so the Sermons page renders meaningful content on first load (at least 3 seed sermon entries after deployment).
missing_requirements.reason: Only one seed sermon is shown being added, and it is placed in `postupgrade`, which would not run on a fresh install; the diff summary does not show at least 3 deterministic seed sermons available after initial deployment.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generated images are present under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and used in at least the Home and Worship With Us pages.
missing_requirements.reason: No generated image files or references to `frontend/public/assets/generated` are shown in the diff summary; therefore this requirement is not evidenced as implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration (AuthClient/provider hook) and identity-based actor creation.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains "No third-party authentication providers"; adding Internet Identity auth is not requested and appears to violate the constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin-token/secret initialization via URL parameter (`caffeineAdminToken`) for access control initialization.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any requirement; also introduces a hidden secret mechanism via URL parameters.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile data model and APIs (get/save user profile) with role-based authorization.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest non-goals exclude a full admin CMS, and no requirements mention user accounts/profiles.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes an outbound link with UTM tracking parameters to caffeine.ai.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; acceptance criteria for Resources mentions safe outbound links and no inline tracking. While this is in the footer (not Resources), it still introduces tracking-style parameters and promotional content that is outside the requested church-site scope.
